name: com.slibrary.sstatemachines
description: S-StateMachines is a tool to enhance your workflow when creating State Machines in C# and Unity. This asset allows you to define states in a scriptable object, with an optional default state, and the asset will generate C# Scripts in the folder of the scriptable asset. The code generated follows a very structured template. This asset is stable and used in various projects. If any errors are encountered please create an issue ticket.
